attributes.action: Increase the minimum wage for people below 18 years old.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that it unfair and an act of ageism that the minimum wage for a 16 and 17 year old is £3.30 an hour compared to the adult minimum wage of £5.20 an hour. For example i am 16 and work in a shop at the weekend and my employers luckily pay me £4.08 an hour but i work with adults who do just as much work as me and the same hours but because they are as little as 2 years older than me they earn an extra £1.50 an hour. I believe it is an act of ageism because it is now against to make a joke of someone because of there age so surely it is ageism to pay someone less because of there age.
